itemnumbercustomfield.defaultvalue: CASE WHEN {custitemnumberlotreevaluationdate4} > {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate3} THEN {custitemnumberlotreevaluationdate4} WHEN {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate3} > {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate2} THEN {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate3} WHEN {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate2} > {custitemnumberlotreevaluationdate1} THEN {custitemnumberlotnumberlotreevaluationdate2} WHEN {custitemnumberlotreevaluationdate1} > {expirationdate} THEN {custitemnumberlotreevaluationdate1} ELSE {expirationdate} END
itemnumbercustomfield.label: Best By Date
